pullRequest.title: Enable scratch space limit self tuning when swap is not available
pullRequest.bodyText:
Enable TR_SelfTuningScratchMemoryUsageBeforeCompile option when
swap space is not available.
Fixes: #9616
Signed-off-by: Ashutosh Mehra mehra.ashutosh@ibm.com

nodes.bodyText: Maybe this code should stay in the early processing of options (fePreProcess) since it sets an option

commit.message:

swap space is not available.

Fixes: #9616

Signed-off-by: Ashutosh Mehra <mehra.ashutosh@ibm.com>
